channel.title: How to make a gadder hammer hold run and walk like g maul
channel.description: any one know how to add a gmaul stance to a gadder hammer, i need walk run and hold and swing, or if any of them are combined, what .java to find it in. thanks ;D

item.title: How to make a gadder hammer hold run and walk like g maul

Its Client-Sided.
You need to do it VIA Class 8 (I think) on Client, and add the correct models for it to use.
